name: A2 Zygon Demo
description:
This is the demo for my upcoming indie game A2 Zygon. It is a bullet hell with plenty of unlockables, rpg elements, and interesting bosses and enemies.

  • Play as either Oren or Flair, each with their own HP, attack patterns, and flying speed.
  • Collect hidden tomes that can upgrade your stats if you collect enough coins from enemies.
  • Defeat unique boss encounters, which sometimes change their dialog depending on how you play.

The official release will be on Steam, and it is estimated to be released in the beginning of December 2022.

I strongly recommend that you wishlist the game there to keep updated:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1910490/A2_Zygon/
